or of maternal health and whether 
interventions designed to improve maternal 
health have been successful. The facility-
based MMR should generally not be viewed 
as representative of a larger area, such as 
SMGL-supported districts. It may be higher or 
lower than the general population-based ratio 
depending on the mix of patients (with more 
or fewer complications) and the timeliness of 
referrals. Further, women from other districts 
may seek care in SMGL-affiliated facilities.
